DomainData.MainInfoText: 我们通过处理您的信息向您推送内容或广告，并评估此类内容或广告的推送，获取统计信息，并生成服务使用情况的分析报告； 和/或以此目的在设备上访问或存储信息。 您可以选择不同意某些类型的Cookie。 但是，阻止某些类型的Cookie可能会影响您对网站以及我们所提供相关服务的体验。 单击不同的类别标题以了解更多信息，更改我们的默认设置和/或查看Google Ad-Tech 供应商列表。
DomainData.AlertNoticeText: 为了改善并个性化内容、广告和您的数字体验，我们使用Cookie来分析和改进我们的服务。 我们还与社交媒体、广告商和咨询分析机构共享有关您对我们网站使用情况的信息。Cookie通知
DomainData.CookieListDescription: A cookie is a small piece of data (text file) that a website – when visited by a user – asks your browser to store on your device in order to remember information about you, such as your language preference or login information. Those cookies are set by us and called first-party cookies. We also use third-party cookies – which are cookies from a domain different than the domain of the website you are visiting – for our advertising and marketing efforts. More specifically, we use cookies and other tracking technologies for the following purposes:

Groups.GroupDescription: 网站运行离不开这些 Cookie 且您不能在系统中将其关闭。通常仅根据您所做出的操作（即服务请求）来设置这些 Cookie，如设置隐私偏好、登录或填充表格。您可以将您的浏览器设置为阻止或向您提示这些 Cookie，但可能会导致某些网站功能无法工作。

FirstPartyCookies.description: When the Hotjar script executes we try to determine the most generic cookie path we should use, instead of the page hostname. This is done so that cookies can be shared across subdomains (where applicable). To determine this, we try to store the _hjTLDTest cookie for different URL substring alternatives until it fails. After this check, the cookie is removed.

Cookies.thirdPartyDescription: This domain is owned by LinkedIn, the business networking platform. It typically acts as a third party host where website owners have placed one of its content sharing buttons in their pages, although its content and services can be embedded in other ways. Although such buttons add functionality to the website they are on, cookies are set regardless of whether or not the visitor has an active Linkedin profile, or agreed to their terms and conditions.  For this reason it is classified as a primarily tracking/targeting domain.

Cookies.thirdPartyDescription: This domain is owned by Atlas Solutions which is in turn owned by Facebook. Cookies.thirdPartyDescription: This domain is owned by Facebook, which is the world's largest social networking service.  As a third party host provider, it mostly collects data on the interests of users via widgets such as the 'Like' button found on many websites.  This is used to serve targeted advertising to its users when logged into its services.  In 2014 it also started serving up behaviourally targeted advertising on other websites, similar to most dedicated online marketing companies.
